page.title: 04Housing - Continued
page.content: The disused railway station and old marshalling yards separate Silloth from West Silloth. The latter comprises 2 garages, 1 pub,3 shops, 1 church and about 200 houses, most of which are on a council housing estate called{ The Crofts.} Some new council houses are being built nearby. {Skinburness}is about 2 miles north of Silloth. Skinburness Road consists mainly of detached houses with a sea view; there are about 85 houses up to the half-way point,{East Cote. }There is an ex-M.O.D. housing estate of 60 houses called Skinburness Drive just outside Silloth, and two smaller estates at Skinburness Village itself along with an hotel and a shop.
